/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. A white car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. On the left side of the street, a solitary figure can be seen walking, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes Beijing's cityscape.
